text: HOMES FOR THE COMMUNITY circumstances, we may accept payments in lieu of the provision of units which meet the wheelchair user dwellings standards M4 (3) (2) (b) through the ‘Project-120’ scheme. The payment in lieu will cover the typical installation costs of retrofitting an existing dwelling and will be secured by planning obligation. 12.102 Part 1 (c) ensures wider accessibility of development proposals, greater ease of use and safety for all residents.
